nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Droid

Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Droid is a children's book written by Marc Cerasini with interior design by Iain Morris. It features C-3PO giving descriptions of various types of droids. It is set sometime after Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The book, part of the Random House Star Wars Storybook series, includes twelve stickers of droids and droid-operated vehicles.

My name is C-3PO. I am a droid. There are many droids in the universe. Some fly ships, others fix Podracers, and still others fight dangerous battles. I would be honored to tell you more. Just open this book and I will begin!
This is a gallery of the different cover variations of Star Wars Episode I: I Am A Droid.
